activemq.description: Fires up a 'Mats3 optimized' developer ActiveMQ instance, which also includes the MatsBrokerMonitor to introspect messages on queues and DLQs, and reissue DLQed messages.

SimpleService.description: Very simple, main-class style 'MicroService' starting a single-stage Mats3 Endpoint 'SimpleService.simple'. The rest of the 'SimpleService**' classes depends on this service running. You should read the java file!

SimpleServiceMainFuturization.description: Demonstration exiting main-class that fires up a MatsFuturizer and queries the 'SimpleService.simple' Mats3 Endpoint. You should read the java file!

SimpleServiceMainTerminator.description: Demonstration exiting main-class that fires up a Terminator endpoint, and then queries the 'SimpleService.simple' with replyTo the Terminator. You should read the java file!

SimpleServiceHttpServer.description: Starts a Jetty HTTP server, with a few URLs that you can go to and query the 'SimpleService.simple' endpoint. You should read the java file!

SpringSimpleService.description: Variant of 'SimpleService' defined by Mats SpringConfig. You should read the java file!

SpringSimpleServiceMainFuturization.description: Runs SpringSimpleServiceMainFuturization.java. You should read the java file!

SpringMediumService.description: Runs SpringMediumService.java. You should read the java file!

SpringMediumServiceMainFuturization.description: Runs SpringMediumServiceMainFuturization.java. You should read the java file!

SpringMediumServiceSpringFuturization.description: Runs SpringMediumServiceSpringFuturization.java. You should read the java file!
